history.proof: qsimpl use: Cmult_plus_distr_l. hauto lq: on use: Cmult_comm unfold: Cmult.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Cmult_plus_distr_l (_ * (_ + _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment H : forall x y z : C, x * (y + z) = x * y + x * z x, y, z : C Unable to unify "x * z + y * z" with "(x + y) * z".
